attributes.action: To support the Governments green plans, to make it compulsory for employers to offer a cycle to work scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employers are using excuses to avoid entering into such schemes. Everyone is aware of the benefits, healthier workforce, less sickness, a more punctual workforce and less tax and NI contributions for both the employer and employee. Excuses such as "it takes up too much admin time" and "we will spend too much time setting the scheme up" and others like " we can't afford it", these excuses are massively outwieghed by the possible benefits that could be available.
